name: Bus Escape
description:
Bus Escape is a short experimental game designed around panic. Can you get off the bus in time for your stop or will you be stuck in bus hell eternity. 

The game is a one week game made by 4 students from KADK, Copenhagen.  The game was designed around the concept of panic. 

Murray Somerville / Laura Blicher / Mathias Pedersen / Ivan Ilko
